name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bag-O-Crap | Blocking the crap from history.

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is to take away mass shooters power by redacting their names from websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The goal of this extension is to take away Mass Shooters power by redacting their names from websites. 

It is still early in development and only has most recent names.
